title: Ticket #927: Have adaptive DAGMAN_USER_LOG_ SCAN_INTERVAL
description: I was just talking with Todd M, and he was saying that it would be really nice for NMI if DAGMan could adaptively change the DAGMAN_USER_LOG_SCAN_INTERVAL value. Their DAGs start out with a bunch of small, fast jobs, and then submit big, long-lived jobs. So if DAGMan started out with a small DAGMAN_USER_LOG_SCAN_INTERVAL value, and then increased it when events are infrequent, and decreased it when events are frequent, it would be nice for them. Probably not a high priority, though.
